pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Bio-Tech Repair Conditioner 500ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Schwarzkopf Bio-Tech Repair Rich Conditioner repairs & regenerates strengthens hair up to 90% (When used in conjunction with Schwarzkopf Extra Care BIO-TECH Repair Shampoo).

Powered by the science of nature, BIO-TECH REPAIR CONDITIONER provides special care to repair and regenerate damage-prone, fragile hair, strengthening hair by up to 90% (When used in conjunction with Schwarzkopf Extra Care BIO-TECH Repair Conditioner).

The BIO-TECH REPAIR range with PHYTO-STEM CELLS and ROSE WATER specifically serves the needs of fragile hair, regenerating from roots to ends.

BIO-TECH by Extra Care formulas with LIQUID KERATIN help repair existing damage and fortify the cell structure for future damage prevention.

+ Phyto-stem cells.
+ Rose water.
+ Liquid keratin.

- Artificial colourants.
- Silicone.
- Mineral oils.
- EDTA.
- Triethanolamine.

Size: 500mL

Hair Type: Damage-prone, fragile hair

Ingredients

Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Quaternium-87, Propylene Glycol, Malus Domestica Fruit Cell Culture Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Isopropyl Myristate, Distearoylethyl Hydroxyethylmonium Methosulfate, Citric Acid, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Lauryl Glucoside, Sothum Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum, Benzyl Alcohol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Geraniol, Polyquaternium-37, Sodium Methylparaben.

Directions

Massage gently into wet hair after shampooing. Rinse thoroughly.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
